# Binance-US-MCP

> A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for Binance.US API. Provides standardized access to market data, spot trading, wallets, accounts, staking, OTC, sub-accounts, and institutional features. Built in TypeScript/Node.js. Handles authentication, rate limiting, and errors automatically. Ideal for AI agents and devs.

## Overview

Binance-US-MCP is an open-source project by nirholas. A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for Binance.US API. Provides standardized access to market data, spot trading, wallets, accounts, staking, OTC, sub-accounts, and institutional features. Built in TypeScript/Node.js. Handles authentication, rate limiting, and errors automatically. Ideal for AI agents and devs.

## Repository

- URL: https://github.com/nirholas/Binance-US-MCP
- Language: TypeScript
- License: MIT
- Author: nirholas

Contributions are welcome. See CONTRIBUTING.md for guidelines.
